name: Doctor Rewind
description:
[SUBMISSION TO BRACKEY'S GAME JAM 2020.2]

(PLAY AT FULLSCREEN, Button at bottom right corner of window)

Try to reach the end of the levels within only 20 seconds using Doctor Rewind's Top of the line time traveling backpack and statis(not a typo) device.

A and D to move

SPACE to Jump

Left Shift to reverse time

Left Mouse to Shoot Statis Device
